nextion_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the Nextion display.

*See also: [Nextion Switch Component](https://esphome.io/components/switch/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

component_name.docs:
**string**: The name of the Nextion component.

*See also: [Nextion Switch Component](https://esphome.io/components/switch/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

variable_name.docs:
**string**: The name of the Nextion variable. Any value over `0` is considered to be **on**

*See also: [Nextion Switch Component](https://esphome.io/components/switch/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

precision.docs:
**int**: This is for Nextion float components. This sets the precision that the component is set to. This typically is the `vvs1` setting of the component.

*See also: [Nextion Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The duration to update the sensor

*See also: [Nextion Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the Nextion sensor.

*See also: [Nextion Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/nextion.html#sensor-nextion-publish-action)*

state.docs:
**string, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The float state to publish.

*See also: [Nextion Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/nextion.html#sensor-nextion-publish-action)*

publish.docs:
You can also publish a state to a Nextion sensor from elsewhere in your YAML file with the `sensor.nextion.publish` action.

*See also: [`sensor.nextion.publish` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/nextion.html#sensor-nextion-publish-action)*

page_id.docs:
**string**: The ID of the page the component is on. Use `0` for the default page.

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

component_id.docs:
**string**: The ID (the number, not name!) of the component to track.

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The duration to update the sensor. If using a [Nextion Custom Binary Sensor Protocol](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#nextion-custom-binary-sensor-protocol) this should not be used

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

foreground_color.docs:
**[Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#config-color)**: The foreground color

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

visible.docs:
**boolean**: Visible or not

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

component_name.docs:
**string**: The name of the Nextion component.

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

variable_name.docs:
**string**: The name of the Nextion variable. Any value over `0` is considered to be **on**

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:

state.docs:
**string, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The boolean state to publish.

*See also: [Nextion Binary Sensor Component](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#binary-sensor-nextion-publish-action)*

publish.docs:
You can also publish a state to a Nextion binary sensor from elsewhere in your YAML file with the `binary_sensor.nextion.publish` action.

*See also: [`binary_sensor.nextion.publish` Action](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/nextion.html#binary-sensor-nextion-publish-action)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

tft_url.docs:
**string**: The URL from which to download the TFT file for display firmware updates (Nextion OTA). See [Nextion Upload](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#nextion-upload-tft).

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

brightness.docs:
**percentage**: When specified, the display brightness will be set to this value at boot.

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

on_setup.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An action to be performed after ESPHome connects to the Nextion. See [Nextion Automation](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#nextion-on-setup).

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

on_sleep.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An action to be performed when the Nextion goes to sleep. See [Nextion Automation](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#nextion-on-sleep).

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

on_wake.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An action to be performed when the Nextion wakes up. See [Nextion Automation](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#nextion-on-sleep).

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

on_page.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An action to be performed after a page change. See [Nextion Automation](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#nextion-on-page).

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

on_touch.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An action to be performed after a touch event (press or release). See [Nextion Automation](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#nextion-on-touch).

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

on_buffer_overflow.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An action to be performed when the Nextion reports a buffer overflow. See [Nextion Automation](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#nextion-on-buffer-overflow).

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

touch_sleep_timeout.docs:
**int**: Sets internal No-touch-then-sleep timer in seconds.

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

wake_up_page.docs:
**int**: Sets the page to display after waking up.

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

start_up_page.docs:
**int**: Sets the page to display when ESPHome connects to the Nextion. (The Nextion will display page 0 upon start-up by default).

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

auto_wake_on_touch.docs:
**boolean**: If set to `true`, the Nextion will be configured to wake from sleep when touched.

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

exit_reparse_on_start.docs:
**boolean**: Request the Nextion exit Active Reparse Mode before setup of the display. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

skip_connection_handshake.docs:
**boolean**: Sets whether the initial display connection handshake process is skipped. When set to `true`, the connection will be established without performing the handshake. This can be useful when using Nextion Simulator. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to call the lambda to update the display. Defaults to `5s`.

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) you wish to use for this display. Specify this when you have multiple UART configurations.

*See also: [Nextion TFT LCD Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*

*See also: [Nextion Switch Component](https://esphome.io/components/switch/nextion.html#configuration-variables)*
